version_description:
-Bug fixes
-IphoneX support
Bug fixes

Localisation problem fixed.
Bug Fixes.

- Fixed a problem with the black screen after selling the car.
- Touch screen input problem fixed.
- Fixed a problem with restoring purchases "Starter pack"
-The problem with the blocking tutorial has been fixed.
- Minor bug fixes

- Bug fixes
- Game optimization
- Adjustments in engine parts hierarchy
- Better position of Fuel Filter in R4 engine
- Foto Mode is based on a current camera position and taken foto is displayed as a popup.
- Better barns randomizing on a map.
- Fixed Car State and Price information on Barn window.
- The way of choosing broken parts has been improved.

- Game size optimization.
- Interface improvements for the iPhone X.
- Repaired dependencies in engine parts that prevented the broken parts from being removed.
- Photo display of cars in the garage has been fixed.
- Fixed acheivement related to the upgrade of tools.
- Bug fixes.

- Additional information on the screen about the current engine repair mode.
- Improvements in the app purchase.
- Game size optimization.
- Interface improvements for new wide screens devices.
- Repaired dependencies in engine parts.
- Improvements to the tutorial.
- Photo display of cars in the garage has been fixed.
- Fixed achievement related to the upgrade of tools.
- Minor Bug fixes.

-Stability improvements.
-Tutorial improvements.
-Game balance.

Fixes in the in-app purchase module.
Bug Fixes.

-Stability improvements.
-Tutorial improvements.
-Game balance.

Thank you for your support. Have fun playing Car Mechanic Simulator!

Hi Car Mechanic Simulator fans!

What's new:

- improved UI
- minor bug fixes

Thank you for your support. Have fun playing CMS!

NEW BIG UPDATE! INTRODUCING REPAIR ORDERS & TEST TRACK!

Hey Car Mechanics! A new update is here!

The CMS Team has been working hard to bring you the new experience to the game you already know!

In this update:
- NEW game mode: Repair orders. From now on, there are 3 customer repair jobs waiting for you every day. You have 24 hours to test the car on the test track and check out what requires fixing. Complete the repair job in that time and there will be a reward waiting for you.
- Now you can test every car by riding it on the test track. Driving model takes into account various types of deterioration of the car.
- 18 new cars waiting to be repaired: Rino M, Rino S, Ursa Veteris, Ursa MX, Mayen Fam, Onyx Eval, Sakura Ventus, Royal MX, Onyx Arbor, Onyx Magna, Katagiri x20, Ribsson Cirok, Sakur YR, Katagiri Aiomax, Oxyxen, Emixia Z, Miraci XS, Super Celar
- New cards to unlock
- New achievements to unlock
- Improved UI
- Premium store with extra content
- New app icon
- New screenshots
- New App Preview
